scripts.dev:hot: concurrently "npm run dev:ui" "wait-on http://localhost:5177 && cross-env APP_DEV_URL=http://localhost:5177 electron ."
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:ui && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --win
scripts.pack:mac: npm run build:ui && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --mac
scripts.pack:all: npm run build:ui && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --win --mac
scripts.publish:win: npm run build:ui && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --win --publish always
scripts.publish:mac: npm run build:ui && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --mac --publish always
scripts.publish:all: npm run build:ui && npm run rebuild && electron-builder --win --mac --publish always
